official-title.#text:
To expand the Moving to Work demonstration program of the Department of Housing and Urban
			 Development, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Moving to Work Expansion Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Moving to Work Expansion Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

The number of public housing agencies authorized to participate in the Moving-to-Work demonstration
			 program authorized under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is hereby increased by 10 over the number of agencies
			 authorized to participate in such program as of the date of the enactment
			 of this Act.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 204 of the Departments of Veterans
			 Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies
			 Appropriations Act, 1996
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Departments of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1996/s:204

header.#text: Increase in authorized number of PHAs

text.#text:
A public housing agency may be selected for participation pursuant to subsection (a) in the
			 demonstration program referred to in such subsection only if the agency
			 administers, in the aggregate, 10,000 or more public housing dwelling
			 units and housing choice vouchers under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 8(o) of the United States
			 Housing Act of 1937

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in the demonstration
			 program referred to in such subsection shall not be provided any funding
			 under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Moving to Work Expansion Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: 9 of the United States Housing Act of 1937

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) in addition to the funding that such agency otherwise would
			 receive absent such participation.

text.#text: A public housing agency selected for participation pursuant to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(whether pursuant to
			 such subsection or otherwise) shall report financial data to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Moving to Work Expansion Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Department of Housing and Urban Development

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall specify to ensure that the effects of policy
			 changes in the demonstration programs carried out by such agencies can be
			 measured.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Secretary of Housing
			 and Urban Development

text.#text:
In addition to other reporting requirements, all public housing agencies participating in the
			 demonstration program referred to in
